title: Clouds of War
info:
--)))- Clouds of War -(((--

               This is a song about a warrior leaving home and love for war.
                    He leaves a worlds of love for a world of hate.
       He will fight battles,kill people,because he is a warrior and his country
                          and his king wants him to do so
                    Whenever a warrior enters such a world of hate
                    you never know if you'll see him again, one day.
         This is a song for all the soldiers around the world, far from home.
                           Such things should never happen...

     ---(OOO)--------------------------( oOo )------------------------(0OO)---

              Composed by Vargard on October 2001, Brussels, Belgium
                     Original composition "Clouds" by Peetu
             Time=03:54 - Composed 100% on ModPlugTracker, of course:)

                      -------------------(O)------------------

Hi, Peetu!I really hope you like this "very free" version I did.
Quite an adventure!Thank you for it!

Hi, trackers of the world!Download&Enjoy!And every time you listen to this song,
 have a tough for peace, love, light and prosperity for all humans!:)
